agreement.step-1: In the first tab, you must confirm that you are of legal age and that you accept the processing of your data according to the current data policy.
agreement.step-2: In the second tab, you must create a username, a password, and a hint to remember the password (as optional information).
agreement.step-3: Thirdly, you must see the success message of creation.
agreement.agreement: Confirm that you are of legal age and accept the processing of your data according to the current data protection policy.

form.password-hint-info: You can also create a hint to help you remember your password.
form.password-hint-label: Create your hint to remember your password (optional)
